citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:10 PM on
12/16/25.
The inspectors arrived at 2:10 PM on 12/16/25 to conduct an inspection but the registrant was not on the premises. The
inspectors contacted the registrant by telephone, and he told them that he was not in the area. The registrant abruptly
ended the call before the inspectors could ask about optimal hours of availability.
This is the first attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Michael Brooks, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:10 PM on 
12/16/25.  
 
The inspectors arrived at 2:10 PM on 12/16/25 to conduct an inspection but the registrant was not on the premises. The 
inspectors contacted the registrant by telephone, and he told them that he was not in the area. The registrant abruptly 
ended the call before the inspectors could ask about optimal hours of availability.  
 
This is the first attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Michael Brooks, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
